SEARCH
Package executor.service.service.scenario.result

Class JpaScenarioResultService

java.lang.Object
executor.service.service.scenario.result.JpaScenarioResultService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScenarioResultService
@Service public class JpaScenarioResultService extends Object implements ScenarioResultService
Implementation of the ScenarioResultService interface using JPA (Java Persistence API) for scenario result management.

The JpaScenarioResultService class provides functionality for managing and persisting scenario results using JPA repositories. It implements the ScenarioResultService interface, defining methods for creating, retrieving, and managing scenario results in a JPA-backed storage system.

The class is typically used as a service component within an application to interact with the underlying JPA repository and perform operations related to scenario results.

It requires the following dependencies for its operation:

  • repository: An instance of the ScenarioResultRepository interface, providing access to the JPA repository for scenario results.
  • scenarioMapper: An instance of the ScenarioMapper interface, used for mapping between ScenarioResult entities and their corresponding responses.

Users of this class should inject instances of this class into their application context and utilize its methods to manage scenario results, including creation, retrieval, and any additional operations supported by the underlying JPA repository.

See Also:

      public JpaScenarioResultService(ScenarioResultRepository repository, ScenarioMapper scenarioMapper)
      Constructs a JpaScenarioResultService with the specified dependencies.

      The constructor initializes a new instance of the JpaScenarioResultService class with the provided dependencies, allowing it to interact with the underlying JPA repository for scenario results and use a scenario mapper for mapping between entities and response objects.

      The class requires the following dependencies for its operation:

      • repository: An instance of the ScenarioResultRepository interface, providing access to the JPA repository for scenario results.
      • scenarioMapper: An instance of the ScenarioMapper interface, used for mapping between ScenarioResult entities and their corresponding responses.

      Users should provide instances of these dependencies when constructing a JpaScenarioResultService to ensure proper functionality for managing and persisting scenario results using JPA.

      Parameters:
      repository - An instance of ScenarioResultRepository providing access to the JPA repository for scenario results.
      scenarioMapper - An instance of ScenarioMapper used for mapping between entities and response objects.

  • Method Details

    • createScenarioResult

      @Transactional public void createScenarioResult(ScenarioResult result)
      Creates and persists a scenario result using JPA.

      The createScenarioResult method is responsible for creating a new scenario result by persisting the provided ScenarioResult instance using JPA. The method utilizes the underlying JPA repository (ScenarioResultRepository) to store the result and optionally uses a ScenarioMapper to map the persisted result to a response object.

      The method takes a single parameter:

      • result: The ScenarioResult instance representing the scenario execution result to be created.

      The method operates in a transactional context, ensuring that the scenario result is persisted atomically. It saves the scenario result to the JPA repository, and if a ScenarioMapper is provided, it attempts to map the persisted result to a response object. However, the mapped response is not utilized in the current implementation and might be considered for further usage.

      It is recommended to use this method when creating and persisting scenario results within an application that leverages JPA for data storage.

      Specified by:
      createScenarioResult in interface ScenarioResultService
      Parameters:
      result - The ScenarioResult instance representing the scenario execution result to be created.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - If an error occurs during the JPA operation.
      See Also:
      • ScenarioResult
      • ScenarioResultRepository
      • ScenarioMapper

    • getAllScenarioResults

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<ScenarioResultResponse> getAllScenarioResults(String username)
      Retrieves all scenario results for a specific user using JPA.

      The getAllScenarioResults method is responsible for retrieving all scenario results associated with a specific user by utilizing the underlying JPA repository (ScenarioResultRepository). The method operates in a read-only transactional context and uses a ScenarioMapper to map the retrieved results to response objects.

      The method takes a single parameter:

      • username: A String representing the username for which scenario results are to be retrieved.

      The method returns a List of ScenarioResultResponse objects representing the mapped scenario results.

      The operation is read-only to ensure that no modifications are made to the database during the retrieval process.

      It is recommended to use this method when retrieving and presenting scenario results for a specific user within an application that leverages JPA for data storage.

      Specified by:
      getAllScenarioResults in interface ScenarioResultService
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the username for which scenario results are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A List of ScenarioResultResponse objects representing the mapped scenario results.
      See Also:
      • ScenarioResultResponse
      • ScenarioResultRepository
      • ScenarioMapper
